title: As Canada ramps up restrictions, a Wuhan resident describes what months of lockdown feels like - CBC.ca
description: As Canada ramps up restrictions, a Wuhan resident describes what months of lockdown feels like CBC.ca China to lift lockdown in most of virus-hit Hubei province CTV News Back to work in Wuhan, coronavirus epicentre, as restrictions eased CTV News Kevin Libin:…
content:
As Canada and its provinces announce widespread restrictions on movement and commerce to stop the spread of the coronavirus, China is starting to relax its lockdown. 
On Monday, Ontario and Quebec's provincial governments ordered all non-essential businesses… [+5556 chars]
